channel.title: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!
channel.description: I need help hosting my server.I am on a router. first i was told i needed a host redirect, so got one, then i was told i needed hamachi, idowloaded it and people were on my Hamachi but couldnt connect to my server pleasse help!

item.title: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!
item.dc:creator: @xerlot xerlot
item.description:
@xerlot wrote:

Y dont u giveit to a frend to host and u play…

Read full topic

item.title: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!
item.dc:creator: @Blazpkr Blazpkr
item.description:
@Blazpkr wrote:

OK dude im having the same problem at the moment the only way i can get on is to use hamachi. Get people to join your Network on hamachi then ask them to right click your name and copy address then tell them to copy that into moparscape and it should work if a green light is flashing on your name in hamachi you have to ask them if the light is flashing if you do not understand me you can contact me on tookool3113@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
item.source: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!

item.title: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!
item.dc:creator: @Super_m Super_m
item.description:
@Super_m wrote:

Have you tryed portforwarding?
check the manual for your router,or ask for tech support…and if you
call the company,and it’s some guy with an funny accent…hang up
he cant tell the diff between an guy and a girl voice…they all
sound the same in there contry…add me heroflame@hotmail.com for anything you might need!

Read full topic

item.title: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!
item.dc:creator: @54n74 54n74
item.description:
@54n74 wrote:

No, when you open hamachi to see whos connected to it, in BIG WHITE NUMBERS at the top of the box, it has an IP. Should be something like 5.7.290.90 or something like that. Like not exact numbers as in like that many numbers. If you dont see and BIG white numbers, then i lol @ you

item.title: I cant host a server! ive tried everything! please help!
item.dc:creator: @54n74 54n74
item.description:
@54n74 wrote:

Ok, if you want to have people connect on hamachi, make sure you gave them the IP to enter in mopar client. If you already did that, and theyre on your hamachi server, then that sucks for you >_<

Read full topic
